first_translate: wow...
each tent has  its family crest embroidered on them.
I wonder which house that red one belongs to.
your grace?
the weather is...
...terribly hot today.

hangle: 수도가 헤일론 사람한테는 좀 덥긴 하지.
first_translate: it’s quite warm for people from haelion.
you’re not participating, are you?
nope.
but I’ll watch as all of you show off your skills.
showing off our skills...

hangle: 너도 더우니 체력 떨어지기 전에 상급 마물 하나 잡고 끝내라.
first_translate: since you must also feel hot, why don’t we just hunt down one advanced monster before you get tired?

hangle: 사냥 대회에 상급 마물이 있을 리 없잖아요.
first_translate: an advanced monster wouldn’t appear at this competition.

hangle: 황족이랑 귀족들이 반쯤 즐기자고 만든 대회에 그런 위험한 게 있으면…
first_translate: if such dangerous creatures were present here where royalty and nobles come to have fun--
excuse me,
duke haelion.

hangle: 잠시 피오나 영애와 이야기를 나누어도 될까요?
first_translate: may I speak with lady fiona for a moment?
lady livia?
huh?
do you mean the monsters I catch during the hunting tournament?!
that’s right.

hangle: 영애가 잡은 마물을 제게 바쳐 주시겠어요?
first_translate: can you give me the ones you capture?
why do you ask?
well,
it’s because I know you will win first place.

hangle: 믿어 주시는 건 감사하지만 대회는 아직 시작도…
first_translate: I appreciate your trust in me, but the competition hasn’t even started yet--
don’t be so modest.

hangle: 전 영애가 줄곧 헤일론의 성벽을 수호했다는 사실을 알고 있었거든요.
first_translate: I already knew about how you protected the walls of haelion castle.
really?

hangle: 전 피오나 영애가 우승한다는 데 걸겠어요.
first_translate: I bet my money on you winning first prize.

hangle: 보아하니 다른 우승 후보인 시그렌 황자 전하께서는 별 의욕도 없어 보이시고.
first_translate: and judging by his attitude, it doesn’t seem like prince sigren wants to participate either.
prince sigren...

hangle: 아까 팔자 좋게 하품이나 하고 있었지…
first_translate: he was yawning away earlier without a single care in the world...
what happened to him having feelings for some girl?!

hangle: 그럼 마물을 바쳐 달라는 건 무슨 의도인가요?
first_translate: then what did you want those monsters for?

hangle: 그건 보통 기사들나 영식들이 귀족 영애에게 호감을 표현하는 방법일 텐데…
first_translate: isn’t that usually something knights or young men would offer to noble ladies they fancy...?

hangle: 안 그러면 황태자 전하께서 제게 마물을 바칠 테니까요.
first_translate: or else, his highness the crown prince might end up giving them to me instead.

hangle: 우승자인 제가 리비아 영애에게 마물을 바친다면…
first_translate: so if I gave them to you after winning first place,

hangle: 황태자 전하는 자존심이 상해서라도 마물을 바치지 않을 거란 거군요.
first_translate: his pride won’t allow him to give any to you anymore.
monster stand-in
correct.

hangle: 절 도우면 영애가 사교계에서 입지를 다질 수 있도록 도와줄게요.
first_translate: help me out, and I’ll help you establish yourself within high society.
how?

hangle: 영애는 시그렌 전하를 지지하는 헤일론 가문의 사람.
first_translate: as a member of house haelion, you support prince sigren.
her majesty the empress...

hangle: 절대로 영애를 곱게 보고 있지 않을 거랍니다.
first_translate: ...will definitely look upon you unfavorably.
to put it bluntly,

hangle: 사교계에서 영애를 비웃음거리로 만들기 위해 단단히 벼르고 계시죠.
first_translate: she plans to make you into a laughingstock among the aristocrats.
thus, let me assist you.

hangle: 이래 봬도 사교계에서 제 입지는 나름 탄탄하답니다.
first_translate: my position in high society isn’t too bad myself.

hangle: 확실히 나 같은 경우는 사교계에서 공격당할 수 있는 약점이 많지.
first_translate: indeed, there are many things about me that could lead to attacks against me in high society.
not only am I adopted, but I’m also the successor of house haelion.

hangle: 거기다 난 어차피 황태자와는 언제라도 적대할 수 있는 위치였으니,
first_translate: on top of that, since I can become enemies with the crown prince anytime soon,

hangle: 차라리 중립인 프리실라 가와 친분을 쌓는 것도 나쁘지 않아.
first_translate: it wouldn’t hurt to build ties with neutral houses like priscilla.
alright then!
I shall turn you into...

hangle: 사냥 대회에서 가장 많은 마물을 받은 사람으로 만들어 드릴게요.
first_translate: ...the person who receives the most monsters at the hunting tournament.
ahahaha.
I look forward to seeing that happen!
she seems pretty confident...

hangle: 귀족과 황족들은 사냥 대회라도 호위를 잔뜩 붙이고 다니는구나.
first_translate: nobility and royals still bring their guards along even when attending competitions like these.
061sigren probably brought some too.
lady fiona!
be careful!
oh,
is fire risky around here?

hangle: 헤일론은 울창한 나무가 별로 없어서 괜찮았는데,
first_translate: back home in haelion, there weren’t very many trees, so it wasn’t much of a problem.

hangle: 여기서는 큰 화재가 일어날 수도 있겠어.
first_translate: but fires may spread quickly here.
fiona haelion...
I had no idea she possessed such powers!

hangle: 이대로 있으면 저 작은 영애에게 지게 될 게 뻔하다.
first_translate: at this rate, I’ll lose to her for sure.

hangle: 그러면 사교계에서 내 꼴이 뭐가 돼!
first_translate: then I’d never hear the end of it back in high society!
let’s move somewhere else.
where do you plan on going?
outside the designated area.

hangle: 하지만 그곳에는 상급 마물들이 서식하고 있을 가능성이 높습니다!
first_translate: but there’s a higher chance of encountering advanced monsters over there!
let’s go!
I cannot afford to lose now.
take this!
you arrogant little brat!
I’ll teach you a lesson!
